meaningMnemonic: If you find some <radical>rice</radical> in a <radical>top hat</radical> it's going to be really <kanji>coarse</kanji> and <kanji>rough</kanji>. Probably because it's not the kind that's meant to be eaten.
readingMnemonic: You take the <kanji>coarse</kanji> rice and try to wash it with <reading>so</reading>ap (そ).
